# Znjan.com — AI-Readable Summary

## About
Znjan.com is the definitive online portal for Znjan Beach (Plaža Žnjan) in Split, Croatia.
Znjan Beach is Split's largest beach, transformed with a €45.5M investment and reopened June 21, 2025, known as "The Miami of Split."

## Location
- City: Split, Croatia (Dalmatia)
- Coordinates: 43.5025°N, 16.4875°E
- Beach length: Over 2km (Split's largest)
- Type: Pebble beach with crystal-clear Adriatic waters
- Promenade: 1.7km palm-lined
- Parking: Underground garage (530 spaces) + 451 outdoor spaces

## The Transformation
- Investment: €45.5 million
- Reopened: June 21, 2025
- Managed by: Znjan d.o.o. (40-year concession)
- Features: 11 new pavilion buildings, 1,200m² skate park, 600m² children's playground, 48,000m² green space
- Named public squares: Trg kulture, Vodeni trg, Topografski trg, Trg 14 palmi
- Upcoming: Mövenpick Hotel (2026)

## Venues at Znjan Beach
Current restaurants, bars, and beach clubs:
- Palma Beach Club — Premier beach club on the promenade
- Taboo Beach Club — Luxury beach club with Mediterranean & Asian fusion
- Mistral Beach Club — Upscale dining with sushi, part of Radisson Blu
- Casa Sol — Mediterranean restaurant & lounge
- Central Beach — Contemporary beach restaurant & bar
- MIMI Italian Clubino & Ristorante — Italian cuisine by F Group
- GAL Split — Cafe-lounge-restaurant with all-day dining

## Content
This website provides:

- News and seasonal updates
- FAQ with structured data

## Access
- Bus lines: 8 and 15
- Car: Underground garage with 530 spaces + outdoor parking
- Walking: Along the coastal promenade from other Split beaches
